repair.repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:3.8.11-alpine3.14
COPY requirements.txt /opt/app/requirements.txt
WORKDIR /opt/app
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt
COPY dagda /opt/app
COPY ./dockerfiles/run.sh /
RUN chmod +x /run.sh
ENTRYPOINT ["/bin/sh","/run.sh"]
